meanings.definition: Of or relating to an author.
meanings.sent1: The authorial voice in the story was clear and engaging.
meanings.sent2: Her authorial skills were evident in the way she crafted the plot.
meanings.sent3: The authorial touch in the book made it a delightful read.
meanings.sent4: His authorial presence in the literary world was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The authorial influence on the characters was palpable.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of an author.
meanings.sent1: The student's authorial style in writing essays impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: She possessed an authorial flair that set her apart from other writers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's authorial behavior of knocking things off the table amused the family.
meanings.sent4: His authorial aura in the room commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The authorial essence of the painting captured the viewer's imagination.
